attributes.action: Modernise, once and for all, the house moving practice in England and Wales
attributes.additional_details:
What other steps in life in England and Wales generate such uninamous opinion compared to the house moving process? The majority - and in this case - a very clear majority, agree that this needs an overhaul.

What is surprising is that (a) this is never properly addressed; (b) politicians are happy to address far more trivial matters.

It would not take much effort to introduce a process that would augment our system for all parties involved.
attributes.background: The house purchase and sale process in England and Wales is not fit for purpose. It renders house moving unnecessarily inefficient; costly; while creating uncertainty far too late into the process. Ultimately this is a system that should be, and can be, improved significantly with little effort.

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
